Job Descriptions

Our general philosophy is that job descriptions are static and intelligent programmers are dynamic. We like to hire intelligent programmers regardless of stack. That said, our current staffing needs include:

  • Backend WordPress (Genesis Framework, Advanced Custom Fields, WPML WooCommerce)
  • Frontend WordPress (Strong in CSS/LESS/SASS, some PHP)
  • Backend PHP (PHP, MySQL, Laravel, Joomla)
  • Backend Python (Python, PostgreSQL, Django)
